menu.name: Chips & Guacamole
menu.description: House-made tortilla chips with fresh daily made guacamole

menu.name: Carne Asada Burrito
menu.description: Grilled marinated steak, Jack and cheddar cheese, crispy tortilla strips, and chili crema.

menu.name: Chipotle Pork Bowl
menu.description: Slow-cooked chipotle pork, pickled red onions, Jack and cheddar cheese, pico de gallo, and sour cream.

menu.name: Fried Chicken Taco
menu.description: Fried chicken, bacon, avocado, spicy pico de gallo, and chipotle buttermilk sauce. Served on a toasted flour tortilla.
